segments.text: I'm watching the boy on the stool, and my heart is in my throat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That two-step stool looks incredibly wobbly beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, tilted in a way that just screams instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far to reach that cookie jar; it's a dangerous maneuver.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really surprised the stool hasn't tipped over already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he could come crashing down with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hurting himself is truly alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on his sweet prize, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below seems to trust him implicitly, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the clatter of the plate and the jar hitting the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an accident waiting to happen, right there in front of my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation fills me with a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR
